s.text: The plaintive question echoes in the moist, warm air of the jungle.
Other revolutionaries have courted the press: Castro practically lives for sound bites, and the Zapatistas are better at planning press conferences than battles.
He has found the very thing he sought to give his fellow Cambodians during the '70s: a quiet life on a country farm.
